lines.text: There's this movie playing out at the drive in. I've seen it about five times. It's called "Saturday Night Girls."
Thats Eddie Dutra, He's about as much fun as a rabid dog.
You wanna fill 'er up, please?
Regular?
Yes, please. You know there's a dance Saturday?
Yeah, I heard about that.
Are you going?
Oh, I don't know yet.
I'm going. Go with me.
Why?
Well, because I'm asking you to. You will have a good time. You'll go right?
I don't know, we haven't really met.
Look, I'm asking you nicely, are you gonna go with me?
I don't think so. That'll be four dollars.
Don't give me no bullshit about four dollars, I'm talking about a dance here.
Will you just give me the money, please?
[Dutra pulls out a wad of cash and hands Abby a bill]
This is a hundred. I can't change that.
[Dutra takes the hundred back and hands her a smaller bill]
Thank you.

[Squeezing change from Abby's hand]
I'm Dutra. Do you know what that means?
[Gets back into van]
You know, I come here and act decent to you and you turn me down, well I don't fucking believe that.
You're crazy.
Crazy? You want crazy? Well, I'll show you crazy.
What are you? Made out of mouth?
[after searching Dutra's closet and finding his cocaine stash]
My, my, Snow White.
[Stands Dutra up]
Where's your money?

[With gag in mouth]
Fuck you.

[Brings blade to Dutra's neck]
WHERE'S YOUR FUCKING MONEY?
You want crazy? Well I'll show you crazy.
That fucking cunt! I want her dead!
Somethin' botherin' you, cousin?
No. Nothing never bothers me.
Well, if I was you I wouldn't bet no money on that.
Got the jug-ler.
